nodes.text: Well, I've seen them when Mynoc has us guard the bridge, but he does all the dealing. Talk to him at the great bridge.
Before you stands a large warrior of your village, wearing pants fashioned from animal hides.
Hello, Chosen One, can I help you in your quest?
Hello again, Chosen One. May the warrior spirits protect and guide you.
Have a safe journey, dull one -- for our sake.
Chosen One? The great bridge is at the south end of the village. You know, you've been there many times.
Oh, you're testing me. Go see Hakunin in the north corner of the village. He makes our  medicines.
Are you having difficulites, Chosen One? You must not fail us - please hurry.
Ah, dull one. They say you are the Chosen One. I must say the spirit of the Founder works in strange ways.
They are nothing to us! They scavenge the dying corpse  of the wastes to live.
Gods give you speed to bring back Eden before it is too late.
Why do you wait so long? We must have the GECK soon. Chosen One, our village is dying.

links.text: Could tell me where the great bridge is located?
One more question, if I may.
Thank you. Goodbye.
Could you tell me where I can find some healing herbs?
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
Never mind.
[TALK]
Could you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
I’m just looking around the village one last time before  I leave.
Could you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
I’m just looking around the village one last time before  I leave.
One more question, if I may.
Thank you. Goodbye.
Thank you. Goodbye.
I’m just looking around the village one last time before  I leave.
Could you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
Oon Ga.
One more question, if i may.
Could you tell me where I can find some healing herbs?
Thank you. Goodbye.
I do have a question for you.
Goodbye, my friend.
What can you tell me of the traders who trade with us?
I’m just looking around the village one last time before  I leave.
Could you tell me where I can find more healing powder?
